00026 /*
00027  * This tests the basic functions of the DataSet class.
00028  * Other tests exercise features to handle different
00029  * data types, column arrangements, memory footprints
00030  * and multiple DataSets referencing the same file.
00031  */
00032 class DataSetTest : public CPPUNIT_NS::TestFixture  
00033 {
00034         CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE(DataSetTest);
00035 
00036         CPPUNIT_TEST (testCreation);
00037         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Delete);
00038         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Open);
00039         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_Close);
00040         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_BytesPerRow);
00041         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Rows);
00042         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Cols);
00043         CPPUNIT_TEST (testproperty_Header);
00044         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single);
00045         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector);
00046         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_TooManyRows);
00047         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Vector_InChunks);
00048         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw);
00049         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_TooManyRows);
00050         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Raw_InChunks);
00051         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_DataSetNotOpenException);
00052         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_ColumnOutOfBoundsException);
00053         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_RowOutofBoundsException);
00054         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_CheckRowColumnAndType_UnexpectedColumnTypeException);
00055         CPPUNIT_TEST (testmethod_ReadUInt16_Single_DataSetNotOpenException);
